name: Short Puzzles - simple jigsaw puzzle game
name_original: Short Puzzles - simple jigsaw puzzle game
description:
This game has 120 fun puzzles that are divided into eight categories.

Complete puzzle animals including cats and dogs, enjoying landscapes, discover exotic flowers and more, download this puzzle.

Find different categories like:
- Jigsaw puppies,
- Jigsaw cats,
- Jigsaw Landscapes,
- Jigsaw meals,
- Jigsaw Love.
- Puzzle Game
